forbidden.name: no-circular
forbidden.comment: Circular dependencies are harmful and make reasoning about the codebase difficult

forbidden.name: no-orphans
forbidden.comment: Files should belong to a module or be imported somewhere

forbidden.name: components-proper-import
forbidden.comment: Components should only import from their allowed dependencies

forbidden.name: lib-component-isolation
forbidden.comment: UI library components should not depend on app-specific code

forbidden.name: no-direct-firebase-import-outside-lib
forbidden.comment: Firebase should only be imported through the firebase utility layer

forbidden.name: hooks-proper-import
forbidden.comment: Hooks should only import from their allowed dependencies
